title: [Windmill Burrow, Oatmeal Street]
description: An old dwarf shovels the snow off his porch, grumbling while he works.  The silver of his beard matches the icicles which hang from the eaves of his home.  A flight of snowbirds zips by overhead, chattering to each other as they travel.
An old dwarf shovels the snow off his porch, grumbling while he works.  The silver of his beard matches the icicles which hang from the eaves of his home.
